name: save-constantly
description: Toggle to save on every keystroke.

saveConstantly.saveWithoutFormatting.markdownDescription: By default, this extension does the equivalent of the **File: Save** command. With this setting enabled, it will instead do the equivalent of the **File: Save without Formatting** command. Note that, because of [microsoft/vscode#245405](https://github.com/microsoft/vscode/issues/245405), enabling this setting prevents this extension from saving any file other than that of the active editor.
